name: ClockWise (itch) (datagoblin, usagiwhispers, Luh Coronato, jsusaki, Petit Suisse)
name_original: ClockWise (itch) (datagoblin, usagiwhispers, Luh Coronato, jsusaki, Petit Suisse)
description:
Time's all wonked up.

But as a seasoned clockmaker, you know full well you can't just get in there and fix it yourself. You must rely on Geary, your trusty golden gear, to put everything back together. It's fixing time!

CONTROLS:

Drag-and-drop cogs to turn mechanisms on and off

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020!
